mapper.select:
select count(*) from product t where 1=1
and t.product_name like concat('%',#{product_name},'%')
mapper.insert: insert into product(product_name, product_price, description, feature, price_description, stroke, notice, create_date, filepath, state) values(#{product_name}, #{product_price}, #{description}, #{feature}, #{price_description}, #{stroke}, #{notice}, current_timestamp, #{filepath}, 0)
mapper.update: update product set state = 1 - state where product_id = #{product_id}
